meanings.definition: The quality of being anfractuous or winding.
meanings.sent1: The anfractuosity of the river made it difficult to navigate.
meanings.sent2: We followed the anfractuosity of the hiking trail through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The anfractuosity of the maze amused the children as they tried to find their way out.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts followed the anfractuosity of a tangled yarn, leading her nowhere.
meanings.sent5: The anfractuosity of the ancient tree roots created a mysterious atmosphere in the forest.

meanings.definition: A winding or circuitous path or course.
meanings.sent1: The anfractuosity of the road forced us to take a longer route.
meanings.sent2: The anfractuosity of the river meandered through the valley.
meanings.sent3: The anfractuosity of the conversation led to confusion among the group.
meanings.sent4: His journey through life was full of unexpected anfractuosities.
meanings.sent5: The anfractuosity of the roller coaster track thrilled the riders with its twists and turns.

meanings.definition: A winding or sinuous indentation or crevice.
meanings.sent1: The anfractuosity of the cave provided shelter for the bats.
meanings.sent2: She traced the anfractuosity of the coastline with her finger on the map.
meanings.sent3: The anfractuosity of the crack in the wall seemed to form a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: The anfractuosity of the canyon walls revealed layers of geological history.
meanings.sent5: The anfractuosity of the tree bark created a unique pattern that caught her eye.
